channel.title: Pages on Thicket N'Thorn
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Thicket N'Thorn

item.title: About
item.description:
Location
   207 South Street
   Bedford, Virginia 24523
   Directions

Stephen Kirbach - currently practicing acupuncture at
   Thicket N’Thorn Community Acupuncture in Bedford, Virginia
   Roanoke Community Acupuncture in Hollins, Virginia
   home visits
   hospice
   as well as open to special needs negotiation

plus the standard prerequestites

  • Jung Tao School of Classical Chinese Medicine in Sugar Grove, North Carolina
  • Clean Needle Technique &
  • NCCAOM certifications

add-ons & specific interests where I expect positive results
   (no guarantees & this list is incomplete / for more, see Evidence Based Acupuncture)

  • general pain management
  • plantar fasciitis
  • vertigo
  • headaches
  • allergies
  • congestion
  • stress, anxiety, panic attacks, anger, grief, fear, worry, indecision*
  • macular degeneration
  • infertility
  • history of miscarriage
  • breach presentation
  • overdue baby
  • hot flashes
  • PMS
  • hemmorrhoids
  • various prolapse conditions
  • alleviation of negative chemotherapeutic symptoms
  • an excellent adjunct therapy in hospice care
  • rapid repsonse trauma
         (sprains, strains, simple bone breaks that
         can’t be set, swelling, deep bruising, inflammation)
  • stroke recovery (If you have a stroke, don’t wait! Get acupuncture ASAP!)

& broader interests

  • providing effective & affordable health care
  • living herbs (plants & their teachings)
  • dreamwork
  • poetry
  • decolonization of earth, water, & sky
  • decolonization of the biota; flora, & fauna
  • decolonization of mind, body, & spirit
  • equal significance given to the seen & unseen
  • embracing the return of the wild & the unpredicable
  • locally & collectively produced & funded community radio
  • independence from fossil fuels
  • rejecting divide & rule tactics in favor of mutual respect & cooperation
  • replacing corporate capitalism with variable methods of cooperative exchange
  • common cause economic principles
  • the usual discriminatory stuff

it even isn’t // I

outside one self I am he who looks out from inside
a serial experience

he is merely the voice of that which precedes him
and sometimes spots beauty

by an act of naming it such
that it is as he imagines when it even isn’t

I call I that when looking upon a dead apple
tree with one low lifting branch

tightly budded in deep rose blooms yet to unfold
all under an early day drizzle

~~~//

*For those who feel indecisive about the sliding-scale fee structure,
     acupuncture can help with that too!

item.title: Contact Info
item.description:
To contact me personally, please text for a return call or text. Phone consultations are free. I am open to answering questions, addressing concerns, and scheduling appointments at:

   eight-two-eight / four-five-zero / three-seven-two-one

I can also be reached via email at:

   thinthorn@autistici.org

Or check out the Facebook page.

item.title: Details
item.description:
Hours
   Monday        10:00 - 3:00
   Wednesday    12:00 - 6:30
   Friday       12:00 - 6:30
   Sunday         11:00 - 3:00

​​Fees
   $10 first time paperwork fee
   $15-40 / Community Acupuncture
   Free phone consultations

First Visit Forms

   First-time Intake Forms: Please download and fill out these forms prior to your first visit.

Book Now
   Save me a seat!

Get Directions
   207 South Street / Bedford Virginia 24523

item.title: FAQs
item.description:
• Do I have to take off my clothes?
  • Does acupuncture hurt?
  • Are needles used more than once?
  • How often should I come in for treatments?
  • What do acupuncture needles do?
  • What is community acupuncture?
  • What should I pay?
  • Why the name Thicket N’Thorn?
